input.sentences: the halloween parade was today and everyone got their jack-o-lanterns made in celebration .
the autumn leaves on the ground added to the fun .
the parade was small this year but still lively .
the townspeople all gathered on the side of the road to watch .
no one had more fun than the kids at this year 's local parade .
output.sentences: There was a parade of jack o lanterns.
The leaves on the ground are fun.
